column2: an A.M. Eatery////Very very mediocre  experience!! So Beyonce weekend me and bestie i town
column3: our Lyft driver suggest this place. We look on yelp
column4: food looks good. We are like ok. Let's try. So we get here
column5: and are told we have about 60-90 min wait. We are like ok fine. We get to the bar
column6: and wait for a drink. It was a jalapeño margarita. Not the best! Ok. So let me try to break down my problems with this establishment.
